name: I'm Miguel
aboutMeParagraph1: Since I was a child, I've been passionate about computer science and enjoy web development and programming. I have skills in both Frontend and Backend, and my goal is to become a Full Stack Developer.
aboutMeParagraph2: I consider myself a creative and responsible person with a positive attitude. I can adapt to different situations, solve problems, and value teamwork.
